website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable hedgehog foods available, this pelleted meal is fortified with vitamins, minerals, and omega fatty acids, and includes a number of meaty ingredients hedgehogs appreciate.
pros: Wheat bran, poultry meal, soy protein concentrate, fish meal, and shrimp meal are the first 5 ingredients
cons: Picky eaters may need to be coaxed to eat this dry meal alongside a hidden treat or two until they become used to it

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's hedgehog has been eating this for about two months and isn't dead. Not sure how else I can evaluate hedgehog food. We give her (the hedgehog, not my daughter) freeze dried mealworms every now and then as a supplement/treat.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: My hedgehog lost his leg
customer_reviews.text: This was an awful experience. The food is very finely ground and when my hedgehog stepped in some water and then walked through this food that he dug out off his food bowl onto the floor of his cage, the water caked the food onto his leg and created a cemented type block on his leg which made his leg bleed and he wound up losing the lower part of his back leg. My daughter and I were mortified. I immediately stopped using this food and went back to the big pellets we had always used.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: ... the vet and found out he had scabies they recommended us using this food to help him get a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the only food that are Hedgehog will eat after we bought him we took him to the vet and found out he had scabies they recommended us using this food to help him get a healthier skin and it did and we are still continuing to use this food of course the vet also gave us medicine to clear the scabies up and it did and we are still continuing to use
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: My hedgehogs favorite food!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog really likes this food. I used to get it at the pet store near me but they ran out so I switched to a different food brand that she ended up not liking as much and her poops changed a lot. I just decided to go back to her previous food and I ordered it here. I saw reviews that there was a lot of crumbled up pieces and crumbs, and there was some of that but not significantly more than when I bought it at the store so I don’t mind. My hedgehog doesn’t mind either!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tenuta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Our Hedgehog doesn't like this food. He will flip his bowl over. lol
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Awful, not safe for hedgehogs!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog hated it. She refused to eat for a few days. Also the food turns to powder. Hedgehogs cannot be around dust.. I just could get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My little guy love the worms not so much the other stuff but that's his preference. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Holmes

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HEDGEHOG FOODDDDD
customer_reviews.text: They best food for a hedgie! My hedgehog absolutely loves this food! The ingredients are quality and have a lot of balance. The bag lasts us about 2 months so you get a lot of bang for your buck. We’ve tried other brands for her when we first got her and she’s either not liked it or it made her poops weird. We’ve been using this for 2 years and will never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Deakins

customer_reviews.title: Our Hedgie Won't Touch It
customer_reviews.text: This ended up sprinkled in our back field for critter food. Our hedgie wouldn't touch it. The bottom of the package was all powdery dust. It was a gamble. We lost. Back to the high quality cat food he enjoys and actually eats.
customer_reviews.author: RaeBean

customer_reviews.title: Mostly dust, barely any whole pellets of food
customer_reviews.text: Came completely pulverized. Very few of the pellets were whole. I basically spent $10 on hedgehog food crumbs. Edit: bought a second time to try again, and it again came completely pulverized. Trying one more time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog is happy
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog says thank you ! I was able to find hedgehog in one pet store locally. I can't find food for her anymore. She gobbles it right down .oh,and the dog says it's yummy, too. 🙄 He pulled the bag down and helped himself. He's a land shark.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: The petstores have limited food for hedgies so I came here to buy. My hedgie prefers this food over the other brand I was feeding her, and its more affordable as well & less dusty like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really tiny and uninterested.
customer_reviews.text: Okay product maybe. Food was incredibly small even for a hedgehog, big enough for a canary/finch to eat. Hedgehog was not interested in what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa AG

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog lost all her teeth and it's hard sometimes finding foods she can and will eat. She seems to enjoy this more than wet catfood and has no trouble finishing her bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Will love
customer_reviews.text: Took a min for our hedgehog to warm up to eating different food but he definitely goes through it
customer_reviews.author: ashley bell

customer_reviews.title: Not for my hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the ingredients are nutritious and it supposed to be very healthy, but my hedgehog does not eat it, he doesn’t like it at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Liu Blan

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 expired bags of food and my hedgehog wouldn't eat it at all.
customer_reviews.author: catherine murphy

customer_reviews.title: Grim reaper
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog passed away I have 2 fulls bags still sad face.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kannin

customer_reviews.title: My hedgehog loves this food, but...
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this brand of food. For this reason, I have bought this three times. Two out of the three times, some of the pellets come crumbled and in a powdered substance in the bottom of the bag. He does not seem to mind, but I wish that this item was handled with more care so I can get a whole bag of food for the price I pay.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced food!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite, well balanced food for our mustard. She won’t eat anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgie loves this food and buying it here is way cheaper than buying it in the store. The bag is a great size and lasts for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This food is hedgehog approved. My little Frito the burrito loves it. I rated it four stars, however, because the pellets seem to easily crumble turning into more of a dust that is not as easy for my hedgie to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what it tastes like or if he's tired of it
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the hedgehog, but he eats it everyday. I don't know what it tastes like or if he's tired of it, but he loves freeze dried mealworms as treats.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: nice to know that my hedgehogs will have food all the time with subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with knowing the product will be delivered to my house for my hedgehogs but the downsize is that the driver does not take the proper precautions to make sure the product is not damaged. Everytime we receive the item the food product is smashed. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Both my hedgehogs love this food and eat it like it’s candy. Only $7 on Amazon now.. Cant go wrong with that. My hedgehogs will keep getting this food until they get sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: John Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: very small pellets turn to powder - Hedgehog did not take to it
customer_reviews.author: Terry Squires

customer_reviews.title: I still mix it with indoor cat food
customer_reviews.text: At first she didn't like it. But she does now.
customer_reviews.author: gttjr1950

customer_reviews.title: Empty bowls
customer_reviews.text: Harley quill loves this foods, b always ate every bite.
customer_reviews.author: ASpencer

customer_reviews.title: Keep out of reach of other animals
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loved this formula. Unfortunately, so did my cat!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Good hedgie food
customer_reviews.text: This is what I fed my hedgie daily. Good quality food.
customer_reviews.author: brittiny

customer_reviews.title: Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this several times for my hedgehog but the last few times very dissatisfied. The bag contains mostly dust not the small pellets and have to use a shifter to get all the loose dust out. Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Olsen

customer_reviews.title: This is not hedgehog food
customer_reviews.text: This is what I received, not my hedgehog food. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S Goldsby

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 2 Hedgehogs recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 hedgies in our home, one loves this food and the other will not touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog wont eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Hedgie refuses to eat it. I have to order her something else because she hasn't eaten in days. She hardly ever turns food down.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Walters

customer_reviews.title: My my hedgehog wouldn't eat it so I switched her ...
customer_reviews.text: My my hedgehog wouldn't eat it so I switched her to a high-protein cat food instead
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My hedge hog loves it really the only thing I can get him to eat
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: My hedgehog preferred over other brands
customer_reviews.text: The hedgehog prefers this food over the more expensive brand, go figure!
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Loved by Amelia!
customer_reviews.text: My picky hog lives this brand... aftrr trying various other brands just to have her dump her dish.. She readily eats this even when she has super worms in the other dish.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this product fresh and no bugs thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eskimo Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good base food
customer_reviews.text: I always get my hedgies this brand and they love it, I make sure to encorporate some dried snacks and mealworms into it as well to add variety to my babies meals
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came in super fast and it's perfect for my little hedgy. The food was the same perfect balance that I normally buy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Enthusiastic Hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: She was quite delighted when I opened the package. Making cute feed me sounds. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Christal Delvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hedgie loves this food and the ingredients are more in line with natural Hedgehog diet- real bug parts, yum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best food I’ve tried for him yet! He always chirps/squeaks while hes eating and after he’s eating. He seems to really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My little guy doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Idk why but my hedgehog preferred the cat food I had been feeding him to this food he doesn’t seem to like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hedgehogs poop smell terrible and runny and my hedgehog hated it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Hedgehog loves this food. Doesn’t upset her tummy like other foods have.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and how quick it came after i ordered it
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: He likes it.
customer_reviews.text: He's grumpy and spoiled but he eats it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: He wasn't a huge fan, but he ate it
customer_reviews.text: Basically the headline. He ate it, but he didn't seem happy about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: liked
customer_reviews.text: Hedgehog seems to like it. Lots cheaper than his old food and seems easier for him to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not for hedgehogs
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog would not eat this at all, and it looks and smells very unappetizing
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Li

customer_reviews.title: 4 star hedgie food
customer_reviews.text: My hedgie loves it but seems to make him poop more...
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me but maybe for you
customer_reviews.text: Might work for some hedgehogs but my little girl wasn't interested in this bag of food.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always arrives on time! My little hedgie loves it and keeps him healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Denny

customer_reviews.title: SHORTENS HEDGEHOG LIFESPANS
customer_reviews.text: I've done extensive research finding the perfect brand for my beloved hedgehog. All the resources I've come upon have one thing in common: naming this brand and admonishing people not to buy. They all call it "toxic" and "poisonous," which are the only words I can think of to describe it also. A healthy hedgehog should live up to around 7 years on a proper diet. Pets that eat this food average around 2. Please do not buy your pets this food!!
customer_reviews.author: Al Jurgela

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This food is fine crumbles, but the hedgie loves it
customer_reviews.author: Oriole I.

customer_reviews.title: Might of been good, hedgie had no interest
customer_reviews.text: Nutrients made it seem like it would have been good. My hedgie wouldn't touch it. Mixed it in with his usual food and he carefully ate around it. No interest.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Mc

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure if it's with the food. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it's with the food. I tried feeding my hedgehog this, and he wouldn't touch it unless he's starving. In that case, he would eat very little.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Patnashetty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It might be all the seafood products but my hedgies poops have smelled ungodly since I switched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehogs love the food. They eat it all and don’t waste it. It’s very small so their teeth won’t get damaged. Overall will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

product_meta.title: Vitakraft VitaSmart Fortified Nutrition Hedgehog Food, 25 oz
product_meta.description: Color:BasicDaily hedgehog diet fortified with key vitamins and nutrients to help maintain health and wellness. VitaSmart Hedgehog Food is made with a blend of delicious, high protein ingredients. Poultry, seafood, and insect meals provide the basis for this pelleted diet that is specifically formulated to keep companion hedgehogs healthy and satisfied.
feature_bullets: Natural Oils, Omega Fatty Acids And Flax Seed To Support Healthy Skin And Shiny Coat
Fortified Nutrition For A Healthy Diet
Tasty Formula That Your Pet Will Love

specifications.Warranty Description: If you are not fully satisfied with a Vitakraft product, simply return the unused portion for a replacement, substitution, or full refund.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars372 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
